stateDiagram

state ON_GROUP {

        ON1

        ON1 : ON1

        ON1 : enter / #123; leds(1)#59; #125;

        ON2

        ON2 : ON2

        ON2 : enter / #123; leds(2)#59; #125;

        ON3

        ON3 : ON3

        ON3 : enter / #123; leds(3)#59; #125;

        ON3 : enter / #123; count = 0#59; #125;

        ON3 : 1. inc / #123; count++#59; #125;

        state "$initial_state" as ON_GROUP.(InitialState)

        state "$H" as ON_GROUP.(History)

}

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

OFF

OFF : OFF

OFF : enter / #123; leds(0)#59; #125;

ON_GROUP --> OFF : toggle

ON1 --> OFF : dim

ON1 --> ON2 : inc

ON2 --> ON1 : dim

ON2 --> ON3 : inc

ON3 --> OFF : 2. inc [count >= 3]

ON3 --> ON2 : dim

ON_GROUP.(InitialState) --> ON_GROUP.(History)

ON_GROUP.(History) --> ON1

ROOT.(InitialState) --> OFF

OFF --> ON1 : inc

OFF --> ON_GROUP : toggle
Events
settings
